## Descriptive statistics


#### Missing values

```{r missingValue_figure, fig.height=32, echo=FALSE}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
knitr::include_graphics(paste(tempdir(), sessionID, gGraphicsFilenames$histoMV_DS, sep="/"))
knitr::include_graphics(paste(tempdir(), sessionID, gGraphicsFilenames$histoMVPerLines_DS, sep="/"))
knitr::include_graphics(paste(tempdir(), sessionID, gGraphicsFilenames$histoMVPerLinesConditions_DS, sep="/"))
```




#### Heatmap
```{r heatmap_figure, fig.height=32, echo=FALSE}
f <- paste(tempdir(), sessionID, gGraphicsFilenames$heatmap, sep="/")
if (file.exists(f)) {
    knitr::include_graphics(f)
}
```
